body.name: Vvwgkpk Kitchen Knife Set, 5Pcs Knife Set with with Integrated Ergonomic Handle, High Carbon Stainless Steel Japanese Knives for Multipurpose Cooking, Chef Knife with Gift Box
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 【Multi-Purpose Knife Set】This kitchen knife set includes: 8 "chef's knife, 8" bread knife, 7" Santoku knife, 5" utility knife, 3.5 " Paring knife. A set of knives basically meets the needs of daily cooking.

【High Quality Kitchen Knife Set】Full Tang Knife Set creates a stronger and harder blade that resists stains and anti-rust.High carbon stainless steel makes the knives ultra sharp for precise cutting and is easy to re-sharpen, to cut meat or potatoes like butter.The chef's knife is super sharp.

【Non-Slip Handle】The handle fits perfectly in the hand to maximize control and ensure comfort while cutting, slicing, mincing and chopping. The knife's frosted handle can keep your hand from slipping when using a kitchen knife, thus protecting your safety while cooking. One-piece knife, the handle is firm and not easy to break.

【Easy to Care】Japanese high-carbon stainless steel and seamless knife processing make it easy to clean and wash. The dishwasher will destroy the blade structure and cause damage. Therefore, we always recommend hand washing and drying immediately after use.

【100% SATISFICATION GUARANTEE 】Every knife set is backed by superior quality assurance for confident purchase. We wish our customer to be 100% happy. If you have any problem about the stainless steel knife set, please feel free to contact us, we're always here for you. Do not hesitate! Try it risk-free now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome set of knives at a great value
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this set to try out as most of my knifes are pretty old and not only in need of a good sharpening but some also needed replaced. (lose handles etc.) I wasn't expecting much but boy was I wrong. This is a really nice set of knives that are super sharp and there is a great variety of knives for the kitchen to choose from in the set. So far I have used every knife in the set and I am very impressed on how they perform. The only complaints I have are the handles seem a little light and were a bit rough but really nothing affecting the use of these at all. They were still plenty comfortable to use and control with no issues and the roughness after a couple washings with a scrubby pad was completely gone.Overall I'd say these are a terrific value for what they are and worth much more that what they are being offered for. Now I just need to make a knife block to store them in. Definitely recommend these and they are budget friendly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a huge bang for your buck. You basically get 5 quality knifes for the price of a name brand one.Feel-These are nice and ergonomic and fit well into your hands-The knife and the handle are all one piece-The larger ones are a little bit on the heavier sideCleaning-They are not dishwasher safe so you do that to wash and dry by hand, per manufactures instructions-Mild dish soap nothing to abrasive-You must dry or else they will rust-Wash before first use they have this oil residue on themCutting-These come out of the box sharp.-I was able to cut a tomato no problem-They come with a tip protector so you don't accidently cut yourself.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These knives are incredibly sharp and easily cut through all the meat, veggies and fruit that I tried. They even cut thin slices of tomatoes with ease. The knives feel balanced in my hand when I am using them and are lightweight enough that I didn't feel like I was straining while holding them. I like that the knives and handles are all a single piece - it gives the knives a sleek, uniform look and I won't have to worry about the knife and its handle separating later. It does say to hand wash these knives, which I do with all my knives anyways. This is great set, especially at this price. 10/10 I would recommend.Review of: Vvwgkpk Kitchen Knife Set, 5Pcs Knife Set with with Integrated Ergonomic Handle, High Carbon Stainless Steel Japanese Knives for Multipurpose Cooking, Chef Knife with Gift Box

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow these knives are sharp!
reviews.reviewText: Wow these knives are sharp! The metal handles are kind of weird to me, but as long as I keep my hands dry I'm good to go. I'm a little put off by the fact that these are not dishwasher safe, but it's not that big a deal. I'm waiting on magnetic knife holder or I'd show these hanging out on the wall. I used the Santoku knife in the set to do my prep cutting for curry. I thinly sliced two quarts of mushrooms, diced an onion and cubed up four big potatoes, added meatballs, coconut milk, massaman curry for a really good Instant Pot dinner! Wow. The Santoku knife can cut, they aren't kidding when they say it will cut a potato like butter! That is completely true! I'm happy with this set! Thankful also getting these for a good price helps these days too! Thank you! -Mike

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a great set of knives, especially given the price. They’re very sharp and if you’re not used to “ very sharp” you gotta be extra careful. I already cut myself twice.They are well made and the weight is perfectly balanced. They feel really comfortable in the hand. I actually enjoyed cutting anything from meat to veggies with these!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars 5 PCs Knife Set
reviews.reviewText: These are nice looking knives, they are a good weight, and comfortable to hold, but they didn’t seem particularly sharp to me. I cut an apple and they just didn’t cut the way I expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Nice Knife Set With Integrated Handles
reviews.reviewText: These knives are built with the handle as part of the blade. It appears as though they are all one piece in design. They are very well balanced, not too heavy, and quite sharp. They feel good in the hand, and work well. Also, because of their high carbon stainless steel, they are magnetic in their properties, in that if you have a magnetic knife storage block, these knives will stay firmly attached to it. The set includes: 8 "chef's knife, 8" bread knife, 7" Santoku knife, 5" utility knife, and a 3.5 " paring knife. By the way, these are not meant to go in a dishwasher. Personally I never put cutting knives in the dishwasher, because they will get dull very fast from the abrasive action of the detergent and water. Overall, this is a very nice set, and at the time of writing this review it was reasonably priced too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pleased. Inexpensive yet still great quality.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Yep, sharp knives. I was skeptical to order these knives as I have used Wusthof knives my entire life. My parents had Wusthof, I went to culinary school and invested in Wusthof knives and am 42years old. It’s the only knives I’ve known. However I ordered these out of curiosity and for a set at our farm shop. I didn’t want to invest in an expensive set in the chance they go missing. I’m pleasantly surprised. Very!High Carbon Stainless Steel that come very sharp. I used the Santoku knife first. I do love a good knife with the divots in the blade (granton). This keeps food from sticking and you can keep chopping as the food falls to the side. The handle felt a little big for my petite hand but nothing I can’t get use to. These are very lightweight also.The next size up is the 8” chef knife. Great for conquering larger tasks. The bigger the product the bigger the blade. The paring knife, utility knife & bread knife are all going to get regular use for more basic cutting. The box says only hand wash & I would second that.This is a nice set, comes well packaged with plastic sheath & knife guard & box. This would make a nice wedding gift.
